# Fix all dylint violations (long files, long functions, unnecessary async, wildcard imports, expect calls)

## Summary

Run `RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings" cargo dylint --all` to see all violations. Categories:

### 1. Generated file (centy.v1.rs)
Wildcard imports and 3683-line function in prost-generated code. Wrap the `include!` macro in a module with `#[allow]` attributes to suppress.

### 2. Unnecessary async (16 functions)
Functions declared `async` but don't use `await`. For tonic trait impls, add `#[allow(clippy::unused_async)]`; for free functions, remove `async`.

Files: `src/link/crud.rs`, `src/reconciliation/plan.rs`, `src/server/assert_service.rs`, `src/server/handlers/daemon.rs`, `src/server/handlers/daemon_restart.rs`, `src/server/handlers/init.rs`, `src/server/handlers/sync.rs`, `src/server/handlers/workspace_cleanup.rs`, `src/server/handlers/workspace_manage.rs`

### 3. Wildcard imports
- `src/server/trait_impl.rs:7` â€” replace with explicit imports

### 4. `.expect()` calls
- `src/server/validate_config.rs:11`
- `src/utils/format.rs:14`

### 5. Long files (>100 lines) and long functions (>60 lines)
~70 files and ~100 functions exceed limits. Split into sub-modules and extract helper functions. Full list via `RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings" cargo dylint --all`.

## Acceptance Criteria
`RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings" cargo dylint --all` passes with no errors.
